page.title: 07RECENT EVENTS IN GLENLUCE
page.content: The Parish Church Minister, Rev Alex Robertson, was called to Baldernock Church,Milngavie,in February and Rev. G Dickson was ordained and inducted in June.A{lorry}completely{demolished}a {telephone box}in the village in March. Public concern over the need for a {by-pass}led to the formation of an Action Committee.Primary 7 pupils at {Glenluce School}won the{Junior Shield at the{Highland Show}for their project on farming. The villagers of Glenluce are fiercely proud of their village and have a strongly competitive urge to beat other villages . This{attitude is common to all the villages of the area with the result that inter- village competitions in bowls, darts, badminton, football etc. are keenly contested and well-supported.
